title: Date of birth details
h1: What is your date of birth?
hint:
These details will be used to help progress your claim.

For example, 23 04 1981

dobDate.dayRequired: Enter a day for your date of birth. For example, 23
dobDate.monthRequired: Enter a month for your date of birth. For example, 04
dobDate.yearRequired: Enter a year for your date of birth. For example, 1981
dobDate.dayNotANumber: Day must only contain numbers. For example, 23
dobDate.monthNotANumber: Month must only contain numbers. For example, 04
dobDate.yearNotANumber: Year must only contain numbers. For example, 1981
dobDate.dayInvalid: Date of birth must be a real date.
dobDate.monthInvalid: Date of birth must be a real date.
dobDate.yearInvalid: Date of birth must be a real date.
dobDate.invalidDate: Date of birth must be a real date.
dobDate.invalidDateInFuture: Date entered must be in the past.
dobDate.invalidDateTooFarInPast: Date must be between 10 years and 100 years in the past.
dobDate.invalidDateTooRecent: Date must be between 10 years and 100 years in the past.
